bug.author: juandspy
bug.summary: Colab link in Docs > Speech Recognition Library is broken
bug.description: The <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/github/espnet/notebook/asr_library.ipynb>link </denchmark-link> on the <denchmark-link:https://espnet.github.io/espnet/notebook/asr_library.html#>documentation</denchmark-link> redirects to a non valid notebook. It should redirect to <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/github/espnet/notebook/blob/master/asr_library.ipynb>https://colab.research.google.com/github/espnet/notebook/blob/master/asr_library.ipynb</denchmark-link> . I can't find the web file in the repo to make a Pull Request.

comments.comment: Thanks for reporting. I am planning to update the notebook with our recent notebooks in INTERSPEECH 2019. I will fix that after returning from INTERSPEECH.
